objects.specification: A rectangular indoor classroom space enclosed by four walls, a tile floor, and a ceiling, designed with light neutral tones on walls and ceiling to create a bright and welcoming atmosphere. The room is framed by smooth surfaces and seamless edges, providing a clean and modern educational setting.

A tile floor consisting of square tiles arranged in a grid pattern to cover the entire classroom area. The floor has a smooth matte finish in a neutral gray tone that complements the surrounding interior design and offers a durable walking surface.

A flat ceiling painted in a light neutral color to reflect ambient light evenly across the room. The surface is smooth and unobtrusive, serving as a backdrop for the evenly spaced recessed lighting fixtures.

A smooth interior wall painted in a light neutral color, providing a bright and uniform backdrop for classroom activities. The surface is clean and free of ornamentation, suitable for mounting educational equipment and decorations.

A smooth interior wall painted in a light neutral color, providing a bright and uniform backdrop for classroom activities. The surface is clean and free of ornamentation, suitable for mounting educational equipment and decorations.

A round recessed LED ceiling light fixture with a slim profile and frosted diffuser, designed to provide even and shadow-free illumination. The fixture has a clean white finish that blends seamlessly into the ceiling plane.

A large rectangular teacher’s desk crafted in a complementary warm wood tone with a smooth polished surface. It features sturdy straight legs and a minimalist silhouette to convey a professional and functional appearance suitable for instructional use.

An ergonomic high-back teacher’s chair upholstered in a darker complementary tone with a plush cushioned seat and backrest. It is supported by a sturdy base and offers a balanced combination of comfort and professional style.

A large rectangular whiteboard with a glossy white writing surface and a slim anodized aluminum frame. The board is designed to offer maximal writing area and vibrant contrast for markers, while maintaining a sleek modern look.

A rectangular student desk in a complementary wood tone with a smooth finished tabletop surface and slender metal legs. The design is simple and functional, providing ample workspace for individual learning activities.

A student chair featuring a bright colored plastic shell seat and back, supported by slender metal legs. The chair design offers slight ergonomic contours and a vibrant appearance to enliven the classroom setting.

A tall wooden bookshelf in a matching warm wood tone, featuring multiple evenly spaced shelves filled with assorted hardcover and paperback books. The design balances practicality and aesthetic appeal to add warmth and educational character to the room.

A large rectangular window framed with a simple white sash, flanked by floor-hung light fabric curtains in a soft neutral hue. The curtains are gently gathered to add texture and allow adjustable natural light into the classroom.

A round wall clock with a minimalist design, featuring a clean face with subtle hour markers and contrasting hands. The clock has a thin frame and a neutral finish to complement the classroom décor without drawing undue attention.

A vibrant educational poster printed on matte paper, featuring clear diagrams and colorful charts. The design is visually engaging and informative, intended to support learning and decorate the classroom walls.

A small cylindrical waste bin made of durable plastic in a neutral gray tone. The bin has smooth rounded edges and a simple form for functional waste disposal without disrupting the classroom aesthetic.

A leafy green potted plant in a decorative pot with a simple modern design. The plant adds a touch of greenery and natural texture to the space, enhancing the room’s ambiance and visual interest.
